GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
net: dsa: mv88e6xxx: Fix refcount leak in mv88e6xxx_mdios_register

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit a101793994c0a14c70bb4e44c7fda597eeebba0a, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit a3c53be55c955b7150cda17874c3fcb4eeb97a89. For more details please see the references link.
